overview: ”Live In Dresden” goes beyond the scope of the usual live documentary many times over: Receptive fans as well as interested newcomers to the Camouflage fold will gain insights into the fascinating world of Camouflage on DVD and CD.  The audio CD and DVD contain a live recording of a concert which the band performed at Dresden’s Reithalle. It’s characteristic of the band that this concert didn’t turn into a pure “greatest hits” event, but contains, along with their most popular hits, selected highlights from 25 years of band history. ”Live In Dresden” offers much more than an average live best-of.  DVD techn. details: DVD 9 - Region code: 0 (Codefree)  -  Picture Format: PAL 16:9 & 4:3  Language: German/English  -  Subtitle: None - Sound: 5.1 Dolby Digital / 5.1 DTS / PCM Stereo
title: Camouflage - Live In Dresden
